title: Inflection points from the derivative graph

content.description: Refer to the graph and the information below.
content.question: The function f is defined on the closed interval [0,8]. The graph of its derivative f' is shown above. How many points of inflection does the graph of f have?

topic.text: 5.6: Determining Concavity of Functions over Their Domains

skill.text: Skill 2.E: Describe the relationships among different representations of functions and their derivatives.
